title: Steak with Cherry Tomatoes and Butter Beans
ingredients: ['olive oil as needed', '2 (400g) tins butter beans, drained and rinsed', '1 garlic clove, thinly sliced', '1/2 teaspoon crushed chillies', '1 red onion, cut into thin wedges', '1 (250g) punnet cherry tomatoes', '1/2 teaspoon chicken stock granules', '4 (180g) beef sirloin steaks', 'balsalmic vinegar to serve', 'fresh oregano or coriander to serve']
